cadSpMgtMib.name: cadSpMgtMib

revisions.description: Added state change count in history entry.
Added spectrum group id in history entry.

cadSpMgtMib.contactinfo: Customer Support Address: Arris Group Inc. 2400 E. Ogden Avenue, Suite 180 Lisle, IL 60532 Phone: +1 630 281 3000
cadSpMgtMib.description: The MIB module describes the C4 Upstream Spectrum Management

SpTriggerType.name: SpTriggerType
SpTriggerType.description: The trigger is used to manage the state transition in C4 Upstream Spectrum Management State Machine. The trigger has the following defined values: TOD - defined with <Time of Day> and reoccurring day within a week Periodic - defined with a period of time degradation - defined with 3 threshold value for the purpose of degradation improvement - defined with 3 threshold value for the purpose of improvement

SpTriggerDay.name: SpTriggerDay
SpTriggerDay.description: The trigger day is to specify the reoccurrence of the TOD trigger for a week. The trigger day has the following defined values: 7: every day 0: Sunday 1: Monday 2: Tuesday 3: Wednesday 4: Thursday 5: Friday 6: Saturday

SpTimeOfDay.name: SpTimeOfDay
SpTimeOfDay.description: A time-of-day specification in hours:minutes:seconds. field octets contents range ----- ------ -------- ----- 1 1 hour 0..23 2 1 minutes 0..59 3 1 seconds 0..59

cadSpMgtGroupTable.name: cadSpMgtGroupTable
cadSpMgtGroupTable.description: Each entry in this table defines a C4 Upstream Spectrum Management group.

cadSpMgtGroupEntry.name: cadSpMgtGroupEntry
cadSpMgtGroupEntry.description: A set of C4 Upstream Spectrum Management group information. Entries in the cadSpMgtGroupTable are created and deleted using the cadSpMgtGroupRowStatus object.

cadSpMgtGroupIndex.name: cadSpMgtGroupIndex
cadSpMgtGroupIndex.description: The index used to identify the Upstream Spectrum Group.

cadSpMgtGroupSamplePeriod.name: cadSpMgtGroupSamplePeriod
cadSpMgtGroupSamplePeriod.description: The time (in seconds) between samples used for the degradation and the improvement triggers.

cadSpMgtGroupHopPeriod.name: cadSpMgtGroupHopPeriod
cadSpMgtGroupHopPeriod.description: The minimum period of time (in seconds) that must pass between successive state transitions.

cadSpMgtGroupCodeword.name: cadSpMgtGroupCodeword
cadSpMgtGroupCodeword.description: The minimum number of codewords that must have been transmitted on the upstream channel before the degradation and improvement triggers are considered to be valid.

cadSpMgtGroupRetryPeriod.name: cadSpMgtGroupRetryPeriod
cadSpMgtGroupRetryPeriod.description: This object specifies the minimum wait time (in seconds) before the retry is attempted. The retry-period timer controls how quickly the state machine is allowed to retry when transition failure occurred.

cadSpMgtGroupEnabled.name: cadSpMgtGroupEnabled
cadSpMgtGroupEnabled.description: This object allows for the optional enabling and disabling of a spectrum group.

cadSpMgtGroupRowStatus.name: cadSpMgtGroupRowStatus
cadSpMgtGroupRowStatus.description: The status of this conceptual row. To create a row in this table, set this object to createAndGo(4). Support of the values includes createAndGo(4) and destroy(6)

cadSpMgtStateTable.name: cadSpMgtStateTable
cadSpMgtStateTable.description: Each entry in this table defines a state used for C4 Upstream Spectrum Management.

cadSpMgtStateEntry.name: cadSpMgtStateEntry
cadSpMgtStateEntry.description: A set of Upstream Spectrum Management state information. Entries in the cadSpMgtStateTable are created and deleted using the cadSpMgtStateRowStatus object.

cadSpMgtStateIndex.name: cadSpMgtStateIndex
cadSpMgtStateIndex.description: The index used to identify the state in C4 Upstream Spectrum Management.

cadSpMgtStateFrequency.name: cadSpMgtStateFrequency
cadSpMgtStateFrequency.description: The center of the frequency band for the upstream channel associated with this state.

cadSpMgtStateWidth.name: cadSpMgtStateWidth
cadSpMgtStateWidth.description: The bandwidth for the upstream channel associated with this state.

cadSpMgtStateModulationProfile.name: cadSpMgtStateModulationProfile
cadSpMgtStateModulationProfile.description: An entry identical to the docsIfModIndex in the docsIfCmtsModulationTable that describes the upstream channel associated with this state.

cadSpMgtStateRowStatus.name: cadSpMgtStateRowStatus
cadSpMgtStateRowStatus.description: The status of this conceptual row. To create a row in this table, set this object to createAndGo(4). Support of the values includes createAndGo(4) and destroy(6)

cadSpMgtTriggerTable.name: cadSpMgtTriggerTable
cadSpMgtTriggerTable.description: Each entry in this table defines a trigger for C4 Upstream Spectrum Management

cadSpMgtTriggerEntry.name: cadSpMgtTriggerEntry
cadSpMgtTriggerEntry.description: A set of Upstream Spectrum Management trigger information. Entries in the cadSpMgtTriggerTable are created and deleted using the cadSpMgtTriggerRowStatus object.

cadSpMgtTriggerIndex.name: cadSpMgtTriggerIndex
cadSpMgtTriggerIndex.description: The trigger index used to identify the trigger for each state transition.

cadSpMgtTriggerDay.name: cadSpMgtTriggerDay
cadSpMgtTriggerDay.description: The trigger day is to specify the reoccurrence of the TOD trigger for a week. The trigger day has the following defined values: 0: Sunday 1: Monday 2: Tuesday 3: Wednesday 4: Thursday 5: Friday 6: Saturday 7: Everyday

cadSpMgtTriggerTOD.name: cadSpMgtTriggerTOD
cadSpMgtTriggerTOD.description: Time of day to transition to next state, in HH:MM:SS format

cadSpMgtTriggerPeriod.name: cadSpMgtTriggerPeriod
cadSpMgtTriggerPeriod.description: The amount of time that should be loaded into a timer, in seconds, once the state machine has transitioned into the associated current state. When the timer expires, the transition to next state defined in the state machine is executed. This value is an integer between 1 and 604,800 (which covers a period of a week). This object is applicable for trigger type of periodic(2)

cadSpMgtTriggerThres1.name: cadSpMgtTriggerThres1
cadSpMgtTriggerThres1.description: This object is applicable for trigger type of degradation (3) and improvement (4). For degradation trigger, this is the maximum acceptable percentage of FEC errors (uncorrectable plus correctable). For improvement trigger, this is the minimum acceptable percentage of FEC errors (uncorrectable plus correctable)

cadSpMgtTriggerThres2.name: cadSpMgtTriggerThres2
cadSpMgtTriggerThres2.description: This object is applicable for trigger type of degradation (3) and improvement (4). For degradation trigger, this is the maximum acceptable percentage of uncorrectable FEC errors. For improvement trigger, this is the minimum acceptable percentage of uncorrectable FEC errors.

cadSpMgtTriggerThres3.name: cadSpMgtTriggerThres3
cadSpMgtTriggerThres3.description: This object is applicable for trigger type of degradation (3) and improvement (4). For degradation trigger, this is the minimum acceptable Signal/Noise ratio (in dB). For improvement trigger, this is the maximum acceptable Signal/Noise ratio (in dB).

cadSpMgtTriggerRowStatus.name: cadSpMgtTriggerRowStatus
cadSpMgtTriggerRowStatus.description: The status of this conceptual row. To create a row in this table, set this object to createAndGo(4). Support of the values includes createAndGo(4) and destroy(6)

cadSpMgtStateTransTable.name: cadSpMgtStateTransTable
cadSpMgtStateTransTable.description: Each entry in this table defines the state machine in C4 Upstream Spectrum Management.

cadSpMgtTransNextState.name: cadSpMgtTransNextState
cadSpMgtTransNextState.description: The index used to identify the next state to which the state machine may transition to as a result of this trigger.

cadSpMgtStateTransRowStatus.name: cadSpMgtStateTransRowStatus
cadSpMgtStateTransRowStatus.description: The status of this conceptual row. To create a row in this table, set this object to createAndGo(4). Support of the values includes createAndGo(4) and destroy(6)

cadSpMgtRequestTriggerIndex.name: cadSpMgtRequestTriggerIndex
cadSpMgtRequestTriggerIndex.description: The trigger index used to identify the trigger. A value of 0 indicates no trigger is attempted.

cadSpMgtRequestNextState.name: cadSpMgtRequestNextState
cadSpMgtRequestNextState.description: The index used to identify the next state to which the state machine may transition to.

cadSpMgtRequestSNR.name: cadSpMgtRequestSNR
cadSpMgtRequestSNR.description: This object is the measured Signal/Noise ratio (in dB) for the upstream channel. This object is applicable when the value in cadSpMgtRequestTriggerIndex defines the trigger of type degradation or improvement.

cadSpMgtRequestUFecError.name: cadSpMgtRequestUFecError
cadSpMgtRequestUFecError.description: This object is the measured percentage of uncorrectable FEC errors for the upstream channel. This object is applicable when the value in cadSpMgtRequestTriggerIndex defines the trigger of type degradation or improvement.

cadSpMgtRequestFecError.name: cadSpMgtRequestFecError
cadSpMgtRequestFecError.description: This object is the measured percentage of FEC errors (uncorrectable plus correctable) for the upstream channel. This object is applicable when the value in cadSpMgtRequestTriggerIndex defines the trigger of type degradation or improvement.

cadSpMgtRequestCommit.name: cadSpMgtRequestCommit
cadSpMgtRequestCommit.description: The command to execute the request when set to true(1). The following are reasons for rejecting an SNMP SET to this object: - An operation is commited for a non-existing upstream channel ID or the corresponding ifOperStatus is down(2). - An operation is committed but cadSpMgtRequestNextState is not an existing state index in cadSpMgtStateEntry. - An operation is committed but the value in cadSpMgtRequestTriggerIndex is non-zero and not an existing trigger index in cadSpMgtTriggerEntry. Reading this object always returns false(2).

cadSpMgtHistoryTime.name: cadSpMgtHistoryTime
cadSpMgtHistoryTime.description: The value of this object is the actual clock time when this entry was created.

cadSpMgtHistoryTriggerIndex.name: cadSpMgtHistoryTriggerIndex
cadSpMgtHistoryTriggerIndex.description: The trigger index used to identify the trigger for state transition. A value of 0 indicates a manual trigger.

cadSpMgtHistoryFromStateIndex.name: cadSpMgtHistoryFromStateIndex
cadSpMgtHistoryFromStateIndex.description: The index used to identify the current state.

cadSpMgtHistoryNextStateIndex.name: cadSpMgtHistoryNextStateIndex
cadSpMgtHistoryNextStateIndex.description: The index used to identify the next state to which the state machine may transition to.

cadSpMgtHistoryResultStateIndex.name: cadSpMgtHistoryResultStateIndex
cadSpMgtHistoryResultStateIndex.description: The index used to identify the result state to which the state machine has transitioned to. For a successful state transition request, the value of this object is the same as cadSpMgtHistoryNextState.

cadSpMgtHistorySNR.name: cadSpMgtHistorySNR
cadSpMgtHistorySNR.description: This object is the measured Signal/Noise ratio (in dB) for the upstream channel. This object is applicable when the value in cadSpMgtHistoryTriggerIndex defines the trigger of type degradation or improvement.

cadSpMgtHistoryUFecError.name: cadSpMgtHistoryUFecError
cadSpMgtHistoryUFecError.description: This object is the measured percentage of uncorrectable FEC errors for the upstream channel. This object is applicable when the value in cadSpMgtHistoryTriggerIndex defines the trigger of type degradation or improvement.

cadSpMgtHistoryFecError.name: cadSpMgtHistoryFecError
cadSpMgtHistoryFecError.description: This object is the measured percentage of FEC errors (uncorrectable plus correctable) for the upstream channel. This object is applicable when the value in cadSpMgtHistoryTriggerIndex defines the trigger of type degradation or improvement.

cadSpMgtHistorySpareCardId.name: cadSpMgtHistorySpareCardId
cadSpMgtHistorySpareCardId.description: The cardId of the spare CAM. The value of 0 indicates the CAM is not spared at the time the request is received.

cadSpMgtHistoryText.name: cadSpMgtHistoryText
cadSpMgtHistoryText.description: This object provides a human-readable description of the entry, including all relevant context.

cadSpMgtHistoryGroupId.name: cadSpMgtHistoryGroupId
cadSpMgtHistoryGroupId.description: The Upstream Spectrum Group index associated with the upstream channel.

cadSpMgtHistoryStateChangeCount.name: cadSpMgtHistoryStateChangeCount
cadSpMgtHistoryStateChangeCount.description: Provides the count of state changes in the history entry. This object will always increase. It is 16 bits, once it is at 0xffff, the counter will roll over and start from beginning.

cadSpMgtHistorySysUpTime.name: cadSpMgtHistorySysUpTime
cadSpMgtHistorySysUpTime.description: Provides the system up time in the history entry. This object will always increase.

cadSpMgtUpChannelTable.name: cadSpMgtUpChannelTable
cadSpMgtUpChannelTable.description: This table describes Upstream Frequency Agility attributes of attached upstream channels.

cadSpMgtUpChannelEntry.name: cadSpMgtUpChannelEntry
cadSpMgtUpChannelEntry.description: The List of Upstream Frequency Agility attributes associated with an upstream channel.

cadSpMgtUpChannelCurrState.name: cadSpMgtUpChannelCurrState
cadSpMgtUpChannelCurrState.description: The current state as a result of the upstream spectrum group state transition. This object is only applicable if upstream spectrum management is enabled for this upstream channel.

cadSpMgtUpChannelStateTransTime.name: cadSpMgtUpChannelStateTransTime
cadSpMgtUpChannelStateTransTime.description: The value of this object is the actual clock time when the current state information in cadIfUpChannelSpGroupCurrState is most recently updated.
